Name: Action
Description: An action story is similar to adventure and the protagonist usually takes a risky turn which leads to desparate situations.

Name: Mystery
Description: A mystery story follows an investigator as they attempt to solve a puzzle.

Name: Adventure
Description: An adventure story is about a protagonist who journeys to epic distance places to accomplish something.

Name: Comedy
Description: Comedy is a story that tells about a series of funny or comical events, intended to make the audience laugh.

Name: Thriller
Description: Thriller film also known as suspense thriller is a broad film genre that involves excitement and suspense in the audience.
